ValidationRule.description: Prevent the First Call Resolution and the Follow Up Needed fields from being simultaneously checked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( First_Call_Resolution__c = TRUE ), ( Follow_Up_Needed__c = TRUE), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot have 'First Call Resolution' and 'Follow Up Needed' checked at the same time.
